template.template: Template Net HP Enterprise Switch SNMPv2
template.name: Template Net HP Enterprise Switch SNMPv2
template.description: Template Net HP Enterprise Switch version: 0.15 MIBs used: STATISTICS-MIB NETSWITCH-MIB ENTITY-SENSORS-MIB HP-ICF-CHASSIS ENTITY-MIB SEMI-MIB

item.name: CPU utilization
item.description: MIB: STATISTICS-MIB The CPU utilization in percent(%). Reference: http://h20564.www2.hpe.com/hpsc/doc/public/display?docId=emr_na-c02597344&sp4ts.oid=51079

item.name: Firmware version
item.description: MIB: NETSWITCH-MIB Contains the operating code version number (also known as software or firmware). For example, a software version such as A.08.01 is described as follows: A the function set available in your router 08 the common release number 01 updates to the current common release

item_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_INFO}: Temperature
item_prototype.description: MIB: ENTITY-SENSORS-MIB The most recent measurement obtained by the agent for this sensor. To correctly interpret the value of this object, the associated entPhySensorType, entPhySensorScale, and entPhySensorPrecision objects must also be examined.

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_INFO}: Temperature is above warning threshold: >{$TEMP_WARN:""}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_INFO}: Temperature is above critical threshold: >{$TEMP_CRIT:""}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

discovery_rule.name: Memory Discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of NETSWITCH-MIB::hpLocalMemTable, A table that contains information on all the local memory for each slot.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPVALUE}: Used memory
item_prototype.description: MIB: NETSWITCH-MIB The number of currently allocated bytes.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPVALUE}: Available memory
item_prototype.description: MIB: NETSWITCH-MIB The number of available (unallocated) bytes.

item.host: Template Net HP Enterprise Switch SNMPv2

discovery_rule.name: FAN Discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovering all entities of hpicfSensorObjectId that ends with: 11.2.3.7.8.3.2 - fans and are present

item_prototype.name: {#ENT_DESCR}: Fan status
item_prototype.description: MIB: HP-ICF-CHASSIS Actual status indicated by the sensor: {#ENT_DESCR}

trigger_prototype.name: {#ENT_DESCR}: Fan is in critical state
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the fan unit

trigger_prototype.name: {#ENT_DESCR}: Fan is in warning state
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the fan unit

discovery_rule.name: PSU Discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovering all entities of hpicfSensorObjectId that ends with: 11.2.3.7.8.3.1 - power supplies and are present

item_prototype.name: {#ENT_DESCR}: Power supply status
item_prototype.description: MIB: HP-ICF-CHASSIS Actual status indicated by the sensor: {#ENT_DESCR}

trigger_prototype.name: {#ENT_DESCR}: Power supply is in critical state
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the power supply unit for errors

trigger_prototype.name: {#ENT_DESCR}: Power supply is in warning state
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Please check the power supply unit for errors

dependency.name: {#ENT_DESCR}: Power supply is in critical state

discovery_rule.name: Temp Status Discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovering all entities of hpicfSensorObjectId that ends with: 11.2.3.7.8.3.3 - over temp status and are present

item_prototype.name: {#ENT_DESCR}: Temperature status
item_prototype.description: MIB: HP-ICF-CHASSIS Actual status indicated by the sensor: {#ENT_DESCR}

item.host: Template Net HP Enterprise Switch SNMPv2

trigger.expression: {Template Net HP Enterprise Switch SNMPv2:system.hw.serialnumber.diff()}=1 and {Template Net HP Enterprise Switch SNMPv2:system.hw.serialnumber.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: Device has been replaced (new serial number received)
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Device serial number has changed. Ack to close

trigger.expression: {Template Net HP Enterprise Switch SNMPv2:system.hw.firmware.diff()}=1 and {Template Net HP Enterprise Switch SNMPv2:system.hw.firmware.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: Firmware has changed
trigger.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Firmware version has changed. Ack to close
